headline: Assessing Republic Services (RSG) Valuation After Recent Net Income Growth and Share Price Performance
summary: Republic Services (RSG) shares rose slightly today, following steady gains year to date and a healthy jump in annual net income. Investors are also watching recent trends in waste management sector revenues and how they could shape the stock’s momentum. See our latest analysis for Republic Services. The share price has gained 9.9% year-to-date; however, after a strong start to 2024, momentum has eased recently even as Republic Services posted steady net income growth and sector revenues held...

headline: Is Republic Services' New Union Deal Reshaping the Investment Case for RSG?
summary: Earlier this month, Republic Services and Teamsters Local 728 reached a groundbreaking contract agreement that ended a multistate strike involving more than 2,000 sanitation workers across the United States. The new contract delivers substantial wage increases, enhanced benefits, and stronger protections, representing a pivotal shift in labor relations within the waste management sector. We'll explore how the considerable wage increases secured in this labor agreement could influence...
